question: Provide a JSON object of all pin functions for the TQFP package.
answer:
{
  "pinout": [
    {"pin": 1, "name": "AIN2P", "type": "Analog input", "description": "Positive analog input 2"},
    {"pin": 2, "name": "AIN2N", "type": "Analog input", "description": "Negative analog input 2"},
    {"pin": 3, "name": "AIN3N", "type": "Analog input", "description": "Negative analog input 3"},
    {"pin": 4, "name": "AIN3P", "type": "Analog input", "description": "Positive analog input 3"},
    {"pin": 5, "name": "AIN4P", "type": "Analog input", "description": "Positive analog input 4"},
    {"pin": 6, "name": "AIN4N", "type": "Analog input", "description": "Negative analog input 4"},
    {"pin": 7, "name": "AIN5N", "type": "Analog input", "description": "Negative analog input 5"},
    {"pin": 8, "name": "AIN5P", "type": "Analog input", "description": "Positive analog input 5"},
    {"pin": 9, "name": "AIN6P", "type": "Analog input", "description": "Positive analog input 6"},
    {"pin": 10, "name": "AIN6N", "type": "Analog input", "description": "Negative analog input 6"},
    {"pin": 11, "name": "AIN7N", "type": "Analog input", "description": "Negative analog input 7"},
    {"pin": 12, "name": "AIN7P", "type": "Analog input", "description": "Positive analog input 7"},
    {"pin": 13, "name": "AGND", "type": "Supply", "description": "Analog ground"},
    {"pin": 14, "name": "REFIN", "type": "Analog input", "description": "External reference voltage input"},
    {"pin": 15, "name": "AVDD", "type": "Supply", "description": "Analog supply. Connect a 1-µF capacitor to AGND."},
    {"pin": 16, "name": "SYNC/RESET", "type": "Digital input", "description": "Conversion synchronization or system reset; active low"},
    {"pin": 17, "name": "CS", "type": "Digital input", "description": "Chip select; active low"},
    {"pin": 18, "name": "DRDY", "type": "Digital output", "description": "Data ready; active low"},
    {"pin": 19, "name": "SCLK", "type": "Digital input", "description": "Serial data clock"},
    {"pin": 20, "name": "DOUT", "type": "Digital output", "description": "Serial data output"},
    {"pin": 21, "name": "DIN", "type": "Digital input", "description": "Serial data input"},
    {"pin": 22, "name": "XTAL2", "type": "Digital output", "description": "Crystal oscillator excitation"},
    {"pin": 23, "name": "XTAL1/CLKIN", "type": "Digital input", "description": "Master clock input, or crystal oscillator input"},
    {"pin": 24, "name": "CAP", "type": "Analog output", "description": "Digital low-dropout (LDO) regulator output. Connect a 220-nF capacitor to DGND."},
    {"pin": 25, "name": "DGND", "type": "Supply", "description": "Digital ground"},
    {"pin": 26, "name": "DVDD", "type": "Supply", "description": "Digital I/O supply. Connect a 1-µF capacitor to DGND."},
    {"pin": 27, "name": "NC", "type": "-", "description": "Leave unconnected or connect to AGND"},
    {"pin": 28, "name": "AGND", "type": "Supply", "description": "Analog ground"},
    {"pin": 29, "name": "AIN0P", "type": "Analog input", "description": "Positive analog input 0"},
    {"pin": 30, "name": "AIN0N", "type": "Analog input", "description": "Negative analog input 0"},
    {"pin": 31, "name": "AIN1N", "type": "Analog input", "description": "Negative analog input 1"},
    {"pin": 32, "name": "AIN1P", "type": "Analog input", "description": "Positive analog input 1"}
  ]
}
